column14: Phnom Penh.------The Nigerian drug smuggling gang had been under investigation for more than 3 months before the arrest was made. *Another unnamed Nigerian man drowned after jumping into a pond to evade capture.------Another Nigerian man is hunted by the Phnom Penh Gendarmerie in connection with the case. ------AREY
